agencies-with-coverage.description: list all supported agencies along with the center of their coverage area

agency.description: get details for a specific agency

config.description: get details about the server's OBA deployment, including version number

arrival-and-departure-for-stop.description: details about a specific arrival/departure at a stop

arrivals-and-departures-for-stop.description: get current arrivals and departures for a stop

block.description: get block configuration for a specific block

register-alarm-for-arrival-and-departure.description: register an alarm for an arrival-departure event

report-problem-with-stop.description: submit a user-generated problem for a stop

report-problem-with-trip.description: submit a user-generated problem for a trip

route-ids-for-agency.description: get a list of all route ids for an agency

route.description: get details for a specific route

routes-for-agency.description: get a list of all routes for an agency

routes-for-location.description: search for routes near a location, optionally by route name

schedule-for-route.description: get the full schedule for a route on a particular day

schedule-for-stop.description: get the full schedule for a stop on a particular day

shape.description: get details for a specific shape (polyline drawn on a map)

stop-ids-for-agency.description: get a list of all stops for an agency

stop.description: get details for a specific stop

stops-for-location.description: search for stops near a location, optionally by stop code

stops-for-route.description: get the set of stops and paths of travel for a particular route

trip-details.description: get extended details for a specific trip

trip-for-vehicle.description: get extended trip details for current trip of a specific transit vehicle

trip.description: get details for a specific trip

trips-for-location.description: get active trips near a location

trips-for-route.description: get active trips for a route

vehicles-for-agency.description: get active vehicles for an agency
